p: These compounds could also be used together with other botanical pesticides to control this pest. In the future, we should also think about the use of caraway EO and L-carvone in nanotechnological research in terms of their practical applications, e.g., for the production of packaging for food products and cereal grains, which will protect them against the attack of S. oryzae. It is hoped that all these measures would help limit the damage caused by rice weevil.
